General.Name: Fubotv Inc
General.Description: fuboTV Inc. operates a live TV streaming platform for live sports, news, and entertainment content in the United States and internationally. Its fuboTV platform allows customers to access content through streaming devices, as well as on SmartTVs, computers, mobile phones, and tablets. The company is headquartered in New York, New York.
General.Address: 1290 Avenue of the Americas, New York, NY, United States, 10104
